sentence.Network_en: The Malian water has good water quality and may be used as industrial water and drinkingsupply.
sentence.Network_cn: 矿区西侧马连河水水质较好,可作为矿山开发用水源地.

sentence.Network_en: Their spirit of proletarian internationalism has won the praise of the Malian people.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的无产阶级国际主义精神赢得了马里人民的赞扬.

sentence.Network_en: Better land resources, adequate rainfall, water is rich in resources, and the Malian Baishuijiang over River.
sentence.Network_cn: 土地资源较好, 雨量充足, 水利资源丰富, 白水江和马莲河流经而过.
